body:
Sorry guys I know you all hate leaving posts...

(Also I didn't really know what category to put this in..)

     So, down to business.   So, lately I have playing a ton of minecraft being on the computer instead of enjoying the outdoors and playing with friends, I've started noticing how much I have been playing, and also, minecraft is getting more boring now.  I have just been playing that much.  Also, I mean, I'm 14.  I need to start doing more than the computer.  So before you start worrying that I will never come back, thats not true, I will be online, just a LOT less.  I've had such a good time so far in the community, and will probably never EVER leave completely, but anyways.  
    Goodbye for a little while (Maybe a long while :P)

kthxbai.

title: Leaving?

:'(
